content: Bringing back some artistic vibes from Japan to NYC, but not sure how it'll mix with my data analysis career. Time to find out!
raw_content: Excited to bring my newfound artistic inspiration from Japan back to NYC, but also uncertain about how it will mesh with my professional goals in data analysis. #NYC #CareerTransition

related_goals.goal: Complete a professional development course in data analysis or machine learning to enhance skills relevant to quant trading and creative outlets
Build a portfolio of creative work by producing at least 5 pieces for public viewing or sale
